title: Analytical AI (Machine Learning, Operations Research, etc.)

children.title: Data Labelling / Annotation
children.description: Processes and tools to annotate raw data so supervised models can learn from it. Quality labels improve model accuracy and reduce bias.

children.title: Datasets Catalog
children.description: Catalog for discovering datasets, owners, and metadata. Improves findability and governance for analytics and ML.

children.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
children.description: Statistical profiling and visualization to understand data distributions and quality. Guides feature engineering and model selection.

children.title: Feature Store
children.description: Central platform to register, compute, and serve features consistently for training and inference. Enables reuse and governance of features.

children.title: Training Runtime
children.description: Compute environments and schedulers for distributed training jobs. Supports GPUs/accelerators, checkpoints, and scaling.

children.title: ML/DL libraries: training/tuning
children.description: Frameworks and toolkits for model training, tuning, and evaluation. Includes hyperparameter search and experiment tracking hooks.

children.title: Auto ML
children.description: Automated pipelines to select features, models, and hyperparameters. Accelerates prototyping with guardrails for quality.

children.title: Feature Importance
children.description: Techniques to interpret model behavior by ranking feature impact. Aids explainability and debugging.

children.title: OR Tooling
children.description: Operations Research solvers and modeling tools (e.g., MILP, CP) for optimization problems. Provides prescriptive analytics beyond prediction.

children.title: Batch Inference
children.description: Scheduled scoring of large datasets for offline use cases. Integrates with data lake workflows and orchestration.

children.title: Online Inference
children.description: Low-latency model serving via APIs for realtime predictions. Requires autoscaling, monitoring, and rollback.

children.title: Simulation
children.description: Scenario simulation and what-if analysis engines to test policies and systems. Useful for planning and risk analysis.

children.title: Mathematical Problem Solver
children.description: Services to formulate and solve mathematical optimization and equation systems. Targets complex planning and scheduling problems.

children.title: Data Drift Detection
children.description: Monitoring to detect shifts in input data distributions over time. Triggers retraining or investigation when thresholds are breached.

children.title: Model Store
children.description: Registry for model versions, artifacts, and lineage. Enables promotion across environments with governance.

children.title: Model/Concept Drift Detection
children.description: Techniques to detect performance degradation due to changing relationships in data. Supports alerts and retraining workflows.

children.title: Experiment Tracking
children.description: Track runs, parameters, metrics, and artifacts for reproducibility. Facilitates collaboration and comparison across experiments.

children.title: Model Retraining (Continuous)
children.description: Automated pipelines to retrain and redeploy models as data or performance changes. Ensures models remain accurate and compliant.

children.title: SDK / Templates / Blueprints
children.description: Reusable code, templates, and scaffolding for common ML patterns. Reduces boilerplate and enforces best practices.
